CUSTOM_DND5E.clientSettings.label: Client Settings
CUSTOM_DND5E.clientSettings.note: These settings only affect the current user and are configurable by each user.

CUSTOM_DND5E.weightModifiers.label: Weight Modifiers
CUSTOM_DND5E.weightModifiers.note.1: These settings do not stack. The lower modifier will be used where multiple modifiers apply to an item.
CUSTOM_DND5E.weightModifiers.note.2: 0 will reduce an item's weight by 100%, 0.5 will reduce an item's weight by 50%, 1.25 will increase an item's weight by 25%
CUSTOM_DND5E.worldSettings.label: World Settings
CUSTOM_DND5E.worldSettings.note: These settings affect all users and are only configurable by the GM.

CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.levelUpHitPointsRero: When rolling for Hit Points, if the first roll is below {minimumValue}, the die will automatically reroll once, taking the second result.
When rolling for Hit Points, the die will reroll until the result is at least {minimumValue}.

CUSTOM_DND5E.form.actorSheet.autoFadeShe: Automatically fade out the sheet when it is not hovered over
Press CTRL to keep the faded view while moving onto the sheet, and press CTRL to keep the full view while moving off the sheet.
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.actorSheet.autoMinimis: Automatically minimise the sheet when it is not hovered over
Press CTRL to keep the minimized view while moving onto the sheet, and press CTRL to keep the maximized view while moving off the sheet.
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.actorSheet.bannerImage: Select an image to use as the banner on the character sheet
Recommended image size is 800px by 170px. Leave blank to use the default
Change the scale of the new character sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.actorSheet.showDeathSa: Show death saves tracking on the character sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.actorSheet.showEncumbr: Show encumbrance on the character sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.actorSheet.showExhaust: Show exhaustion tracking on the character sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.actorSheet.showInspira: Show the Inspiration button on the character sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.actorSheet.showLegenda: Show Legendary Actions on the NPC sheet
Show Legendary Resistance on the NPC sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.actorSheet.showManageC: Show the Manage Currency button on the character sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.actorSheet.showUseLair: Show Use Lair Action on the NPC sheet

CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.dead.applyDea: Apply the Dead status effect when an NPC is reduced to 0 HP
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.dead.applyIns: Apply Instant Death when a character suffers damage equal or greater than their remaining HP plus their max HP
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.dead.deadRota: Angle to rotate the token when it has the Dead status effect
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.dead.deadTint: Color to tint the token when it has the Dead status effect
Must be in hex color format. Leave blank for no tint
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.deathSaves.de: The roll mode when rolling Death Saving Throws
When Blind GM Roll is selected, successes and failures won't appear on the character sheet for players
The value required to succeed a death saving throw
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.deathSaves.re: Use 3 to remove all, 1 to remove one and 0 to remove none
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.exhaustion.ap: Apply Exhaustion when a character is reduced to 0 HP
If a character is reduced to 0 HP in combat, apply Exhaustion when the combat ends
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.hitPoints.app: Apply Massive Damage when a character suffers damage equal to or greater than half their max HP
Apply negative hit points for characters
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.hitPoints.neg: Heal from 0 HP when a character has negative HP
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.initiative.re: Reroll Initiative for all combatants at the start of each round
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.inspiration.a: Value to roll on the dice to award Inspiration
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.mobDamage.ena: When attacking a single token with four or more identical tokens selected, the attack roll is replaced with a damage roll based on the Mobs Average Results table (DMG 2024, p. 82)
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.mobDamage.use: Use average damage instead of rolling
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.probabilistic: Enable the 'Use Probabilistic Damage' option in the Attack activity's Effect tab
Use average damage instead of rolling
Replace the attack roll with a probabilistic damage roll.
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.prone.proneRo: Angle to rotate the token when it has the Prone status effect
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.resting.useCa: When taking a Long Rest, optionally require spending Camp Supplies
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.rollingHitPoi: Automatically reroll when result is below the minimum value
Roll HP for NPCs when dragging their token onto the canvas
Reroll once, otherwise reroll until minimum is met
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.unconscious.a: Apply the Unconscious status effect when a PC is reduced to 0 HP
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.gameplay.title: Configure Gameplay
